A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really enjoyed it. It was exciting and visually stunning. The plot was good and was moving. The acting was worlds above the pre-quels. And contrary to some people's opinions\, I thought it FELT like a Star Wars movie.  It pays homage to the earlier films\, and doesn't do violence to their vision\, and this was important to me\, as I've been a fan ever since the very first one came out in '77. Very entertaining.
